title: (Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department public expenditure reform) order

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform) Order
(Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform) Order
heading: 2. Michael O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Michael O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Patrick O’Donovan, Minister of State at the 
Department of Public Expenditure and Reform, with effect from 28 September
text_norm: 2 michael connor particular whose address deposited office department public expenditure reform appointed special adviser patrick donovan minister state department public expenditure reform effect 28 september

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Public Expenditure and Reform) Order
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [648] 3
